thread.title: Pi Day Sale: Learn Raspberry Pi 3 for 91% off
thread.title_full: Pi Day Sale: Learn Raspberry Pi 3 for 91% off

author: AA Picks
title: Pi Day Sale: Learn Raspberry Pi 3 for 91% off
text:
The AAPicks team writes about things we think you’ll like, and we may see a share of revenue from any purchases made through affiliate links. 

Since 3/14159265359… would make for a hell of a long March, we’re forced to celebrate Pi Day on the 14th of this month.
In spite of this egregious case of convenient rounding, there’s still an upshot: a group of Raspberry Pi course instructors have bundled together their comprehensive learning packages and made them available for a record low cost.
The Complete Raspberry Pi 3 Training Bundle is currently on sale for just $19. That’s 6 courses spanning 170 lessons including the ever popular From 0 to 1: Raspberry Pi and the Internet of Things package.
Here’s what you get: Wireless Penetration and Testing with Kali Linux and Raspberry Pi by Cristian Gradosteanu Cluster Pi: Build a Raspberry Pi Beowulf Cluster by Wolf Donat Raspberry Pi Essentials and Extras by Wolf Donat PiBot: Build your own Raspberry Pi Powered Robot by Wolf Donat Raspberry Pi: Full Stack by Peter Dalmaris From 0 to 1: Raspberry Pi and the Internet of things If you’ve ever been interested in getting creative with the world’s premiere single board computer system, now might be your chance. Take at look at the entire bundle right over here .
Is this deal not quite right for you? Head over to the AAPICKS HUB for more offers you’re going to love! For notifications of offers and price drops, sign up for our Deal Alerts newsletter. We may get a small percent from purchases made through our posts. However, the AA Picks team only showcases verified, legitimate deals. It’s a nice way to help keep the lights on around here, and it decreases our reliance on pesky ads. If you have questions or concerns, please reach out at aapicks@androidauthority.com .
